title: Medical Terminology for Beginners
description: Get familiar with the fundamental medical terms and their applications in healthcare.

sections.sectionDescription: Learn the basics of medical terminology and its importance in healthcare.

chapters.title: What is Medical Terminology?
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/medical-terminology.mp4

chapters.title: Common Prefixes and Suffixes
chapters.content: Learn about commonly used medical prefixes and suffixes that help in understanding medical terms.

chapters.title: Medical Terminology Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What does the prefix 'hypo' mean?
2. What does the suffix '-itis' indicate?
3. Name two common medical abbreviations.

sections.sectionDescription: Explore the foundational concepts of human anatomy and physiology.

chapters.title: Introduction to Human Anatomy
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/human-anatomy.mp4

chapters.title: The Circulatory System
chapters.content: Learn about the components and functions of the human circulatory system.

chapters.title: Anatomy and Physiology Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is the largest organ in the human body?
2. Name the main organs of the circulatory system.
3. What is the role of red blood cells?

title: Introduction to Medical Ethics
description: Understand the basic principles of medical ethics and their application in healthcare settings.

sections.sectionDescription: Learn the key ethical principles applied in the medical field.

chapters.title: The Four Pillars of Medical Ethics
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/four-pillars.mp4

chapters.title: Informed Consent
chapters.content: Understanding the importance of informed consent in medical practice.

chapters.title: Medical Ethics Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is the principle of autonomy?
2. Explain the role of confidentiality in healthcare.
3. How does beneficence relate to patient care?

sections.sectionDescription: Explore the ethical considerations involved in medical decision-making.

chapters.title: Making Ethical Medical Decisions
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/ethical-decisions.mp4

chapters.title: The Role of Doctors in Ethical Dilemmas
chapters.content: A discussion of the role of doctors when facing ethical dilemmas in practice.

chapters.title: Medical Decision-Making Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is paternalism in medical decision-making?
2. Describe the concept of distributive justice in healthcare.
3. Why is patient autonomy important?

title: Pharmacology and Drug Interactions
description: Understand the basics of pharmacology, drug classifications, and how drugs interact with each other.

sections.sectionDescription: Learn the key concepts in pharmacology, including drug classifications and therapeutic uses.

chapters.title: Basic Pharmacology Concepts
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/pharmacology-basics.mp4

chapters.title: Drug Classes and Their Uses
chapters.content: Explore various drug classes, their mechanisms of action, and common therapeutic uses.

chapters.title: Pharmacology Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is the difference between analgesics and anesthetics?
2. Name two types of antibiotics.
3. What are the main uses of beta-blockers?

sections.sectionDescription: Learn how drugs interact with each other and the potential side effects.

chapters.title: Understanding Drug Interactions
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/drug-interactions.mp4

chapters.title: Common Drug Interactions
chapters.content: Learn about common drug interactions and how they affect patient safety.

chapters.title: Drug Interactions and Side Effects Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is an example of a drug-food interaction?
2. What are the side effects of opioids?
3. How can drug interactions impact patient treatment?

title: Cardiovascular Diseases and Treatment
description: This course covers the types, causes, and treatments for cardiovascular diseases.

sections.sectionDescription: Explore the various types of cardiovascular diseases and their symptoms.

chapters.title: Overview of Cardiovascular Diseases
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/cardiovascular-diseases.mp4

chapters.title: Coronary Artery Disease
chapters.content: Learn about coronary artery disease, its risk factors, and symptoms.

chapters.title: Cardiovascular Disease Types Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What are the primary causes of coronary artery disease?
2. What are the symptoms of heart failure?
3. What is arrhythmia?

sections.sectionDescription: Learn the different treatments available for cardiovascular diseases, including medical and surgical options.

chapters.title: Medical Treatment for Cardiovascular Diseases
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/cv-disease-treatment.mp4

chapters.title: Surgical Interventions
chapters.content: Explore various surgical treatments for cardiovascular diseases, such as bypass surgery.

chapters.title: Cardiovascular Treatment Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What are common medications used to treat hypertension?
2. Describe the procedure of angioplasty.
3. How does lifestyle change impact cardiovascular health?

title: Introduction to Programming
description: Learn the basics of programming with this comprehensive course.

sections.sectionDescription: Learn the basics of programming and set up your development environment.

chapters.title: Welcome to Programming
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/welcome.mp4

chapters.title: What is Programming?
chapters.content: Programming is the process of creating instructions for computers to follow...

chapters.title: Programming Basics Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is a variable?
2. What is the difference between a compiler and an interpreter?
3. Name three popular programming languages.

sections.sectionDescription: Explore fundamental programming concepts and data types.

chapters.title: Variables and Data Types
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/variables-data-types.mp4

chapters.title: Control Structures
chapters.content: Control structures are fundamental elements in programming that allow you to control the flow of your program...

chapters.title: Control Structures Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is an if-else statement?
2. Explain the purpose of a loop.
3. What is a switch statement?

sections.sectionDescription: Learn how to organize your code using functions and modules.

chapters.title: Introduction to Functions
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/intro-to-functions.mp4

chapters.title: Creating and Using Modules
chapters.content: Modules are a way to organize and reuse code across different parts of your program...

chapters.title: Functions and Modules Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is the difference between a function and a method?
2. How do you import a module in Python?
3. What is the purpose of the 'return' statement in a function?

title: Advanced Machine Learning
description: Dive deep into machine learning algorithms and techniques.

sections.sectionDescription: Learn about neural networks and their applications.

chapters.title: Introduction to Neural Networks
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/neural-networks-intro.mp4

chapters.title: Neural Networks Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is a neuron?
2. Explain backpropagation.
3. What is an activation function?

chapters.title: Types of Neural Networks
chapters.content: There are various types of neural networks, each designed for specific tasks...

sections.sectionDescription: Explore advanced deep learning techniques and architectures.

chapters.title: Convolutional Neural Networks
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/cnn-explained.mp4

chapters.title: Recurrent Neural Networks
chapters.content: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) are a class of neural networks designed to work with sequential data...

chapters.title: Deep Learning Architectures Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is the main advantage of CNNs?
2. Explain the vanishing gradient problem in RNNs.
3. What is transfer learning?

sections.sectionDescription: Study cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and their implementations.

chapters.title: Generative Adversarial Networks
chapters.content: https://example.com/videos/gan-explained.mp4

chapters.title: Reinforcement Learning
chapters.content: Reinforcement Learning is a type of machine learning where an agent learns to make decisions by interacting with an environment...

chapters.title: Advanced ML Algorithms Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What are the components of a GAN?
2. Explain the difference between Q-learning and policy gradients.
3. What is the purpose of the discriminator in a GAN?

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build modern websites.

chapters.title: Introduction to HTML

chapters.content:

2. Name three basic HTML tags.
3. What is the purpose of the <head> tag?

chapters.title: HTML Forms and Input Elements
chapters.content: HTML forms are used to collect user input. Learn about various input types and form elements...

chapters.title: CSS Basics

chapters.title: CSS Layout Techniques
chapters.content: Learn about different CSS layout techniques including Flexbox and Grid...

chapters.title: CSS Styling Quiz
chapters.content:
1. What is the box model in CSS?
2. Explain the difference between inline and block elements.
3. How do you center an element horizontally and vertically using Flexbox?

title: Data Science Fundamentals

chapters.content:
